comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:11.0a1) Gecko/20111122 Firefox/11.0a1
Build ID: 20111122030949

Steps to reproduce:

1. Open up enough tabs so that they overflow the tab bar(the panning arrows show up)
2. focus on the first tab and drag it to the right panning untill the list shows the next tabs


Actual results:

The first visible tab is highlighted.


Expected results:

The regular tab dragging stuff
